'''Jane Richie''' is part of [[Seattle Grace Hospital|Seattle Grace's]] in-house counsel.

==History==
When [[Meredith Grey]] admitted to popping through a glove during a surgery in front of the patient's husband, Jane was brought in to talk to Meredith in order to protect the hospital in case he decided to sue them. Burke stood up for Meredith in their meeting and Meredith ended up with one month of probation.

==Career==
Jane is a lawyer. She is part of the in-house counsel for [[Seattle Grace Hospital]].
